Student Affairs Technology     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Student Affairs Technology      Student Affairs Technology   Main Menu    Services    Employees           New Employee    Terminated Employee         Equipment           Purchase Equipment    Loaner Equipment    Swiper Reader Request         About Us           Contact Us    Feedback    SATECH Staff    SAWEB Staff          Eyebrow menu    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Student Affairs Technology       Student Affairs Technology              Student Affairs Technology (SAtech) provides the highest quality technology support and serves the individual goals of Student Affairs units by providing guidance on technology strategy, procurement and implementation. SAtech maintains secure, robust, adaptable systems that support the computing needs of its varied user base.        Featured links        Services  Student Affairs Technology provides a wide variety of services from computer assistance to application development.          New Employee Onboarding  The goal of the IT onboarding process is to streamline setup of technology resources and systems for new employees in SA          Equipment  Find out about equipment purchase and loaner equipment. We want this to be as easy a process as possible for SA units.                 Need Support?             Submit request online using the service portal            Call helpdesk at 312-413-5135            Visit the SA Technology Office               Email             Feedback or Suggestions
